availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Isabell Marlow. Father of Margaret Marlow, Monroe Marlow, Clinton Marlow, Mary Marlow, John Marlow, Ann Marlow, C. Marlow, Marion Marlow, and Eugene Marlow. Resident in Hancock County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 106-07.
Find A Grave, "Jesse Marlow (March 15, 1821-November 17, 1884)," Memorial #21713091, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/21713091 (accessed April 10, 2018).
